feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for New Zealand issued by MetService
feed.rights: Copyright Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited, 2026. Licensed under Creative Commons BY 4.0.

entry.title: Strong Wind Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Severe gale northwesterlies gusting 120 km/h in exposed places. Note, winds easing from the south overnight Sunday. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, with thunderstorms possible. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Severe gale northwesterlies gusting 120 km/h in exposed places. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 240 to 300 mm of rain. Peak rates of 30 to 40 mm/h expected Sunday morning and afternoon, especially in thunderstorms. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 200 to 250 mm of rain about the main divide, and 100 to 150 mm within 20 km farther east. Thunderstorms possible. Peak rates of 30 to 40 mm/h about the Divide expected Sunday morning and afternoon. Freezing level 3500 metres. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Severe gale northwesterlies gusting 130 km/h in exposed places. Note, winds easing from the south from late Sunday morning. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Note, winds easing from the south from late Sunday morning. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places, turning westerly Sunday morning and easing about inland Southland. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 100 to 130 mm of rain. Peak rates of 20 to 30 mm/h expected Sunday morning, especially in thunderstorms. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain, with thunderstorms possible. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria within 15 km east of the main divide. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.
